CrawlSchedulerService - Class in org.gbif.crawler.scheduler
This service scans the registry at a configurable interval and schedules a crawl for all Datasets that fulfill a few conditions: The dataset is not deleted The dataset is not external The dataset has never been crawled before The dataset hasn't been crawled in a week

CrawlServerBaseService<T extends CrawlServerConfiguration> - Class in org.gbif.crawler.common.crawlserver
A crawl server base class that listens to a zookeeper queue for requested crawls and delegates these requests to a crawl consumer instance which is created once on startup through CrawlServerBaseService.newConsumer(CuratorFramework, MessagePublisher, CrawlServerConfiguration) which needs to be implemented.
